overview:
Terkay is a software engineer and mobile technologies enthusiast. He received his B.S. and M.S. degrees in Computer Science from the University of Colorado at Boulder. Having gained two years of invaluable mobile development experience in the epicenter that is Tokyo, Japan, Nick returned to Boulder to architect new solutions for the mobile world of tomorrow. With a sharp eye for UI, he keenly focuses his technical know-how on aesthetic and functional design.

Nick recently moved to Chicago where he founded and created SilvrSpoon, which launched at three restaurants in August 2011. http://silvrspoon.com/
